document.full_text: nvidia corp plans to buy privately held cellphone chipmaker icera for $367 million in cash, stepping up competition against qualcomm inc and intel corp in the smartphone chip market.
document.title: nvidia to buy phone chipmaker icera for $367 million
lines_and_colors: nvidia corp plans to buy privately held cellphone chipmaker icera for $367 million in cash, stepping up competition against qualcomm inc and intel corp in the smartphone chip market.
